ProvisionHost.com
http://provisionhost.com

In order to introduce our new Dallas nodes and Toronto location, we are offering our PHVPS1 plan for $5 / month! This makes it nearly 60% off and only while supplies last.

Dallas Test File: http://dallas.provisionhost.com/100mb.test
Toronto Test File: http://toronto.provisionhost.com/100mb.test

Provision Host is a privately owned Canadian based firm, operating since late 2010. It was built around the idea of providing practical and reliable web hosting services. Since then Provision Host has continually strived to offer premium quality services while maintaining an excellent level of support.

> PHVPS1 Plan
Cost: $5.00 /mo with promotional code **"LET1SALE"**
512MB RAM
15GB Disk Space
500GB Bandwidth
SolusVM Control Panel
IRC and VPN allowed upon request
100mbps bandwidth ports

ORDER NOW [DALLAS] - https://client.provisionhost.com/cart.php?gid=7

Dallas Reviews:
http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/3714/review-provision-host
http://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/3728/review-provisionhost-phvps-.5-pack

ORDER NOW [TORONTO] - https://client.provisionhost.com/cart.php?gid=18

We offer a complete VPS solution with different configurations to match your specific requirements. All servers are virtualized with OpenVZ, hosted on enterprise class hardware and located in enterprise class datacenters. All major Linux distributions are available to install (Cent OS, Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora).

_Datacenter Information_

Databank - http://www.databank.com/

**Toronto DC:**

If you have any questions you may contact us at any time.
